item.title: 对冲基金在Wegovy对决前大举押注Hims & Hers Health，Hazeltree数据显示
item.description: 对冲基金做空Hims & Hers Health的仓位在1月份达到至少一年来的最高水平，就在这家在线远程医疗公司与诺和诺德就其低价减肥药发生冲突之前。Hazeltree向路透社提供的数据显示。【原文：Hedge fund bets against Hims & Hers Health hit their highest in at least a year in January, just before the online telehealth firm clashed with Novo Nordisk over its cut-price weight-loss pill, according to data shared with Reuters by Hazeltree.】

item.title: 中国表示，在荷兰对恩智浦半导体案作出裁决后，确保半导体供应链稳定是首要任务。
item.description: 中国商务部周五在官网声明中表示，恢复全球半导体供应链稳定是当前首要任务。该声明是对荷兰法院本周早些时候针对恩智浦半导体公司裁决的回应。【原文：Restoring stability to global semiconductor supply chains is the top priority, China's commerce ministry said Friday in response to a Dutch court ruling earlier this week on Nexperia, according to a statement published on the ministry's website.】

item.title: 独家：Stellantis在欧洲各地重启柴油车生产，电动汽车退潮之际
item.description: 据路透社对经销商网站及公司声明的梳理，菲亚特-克莱斯勒汽车公司正悄然在欧洲复产至少七款轿车及乘用车型的柴油版本，同时逐步退出电动汽车领域。【原文：Fiat-to-Jeep owner Stellantis is quietly resurrecting diesel versions of at least seven car and passenger van models across Europe as it retreats from electric vehicles, according to a review of dealer websites and company statements to Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国预计将阿里巴巴等公司列入涉嫌协助中国军方的企业名单
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，特朗普政府最早将于周五将阿里巴巴等公司列入涉嫌协助中国军方的企业名单。【原文：The Trump administration is expected to add companies, including Alibaba , to a list of firms allegedly aiding China's military as soon as Friday, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 贝森特表示国会应在今年春季通过加密货币监管法案
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周五表示，国会通过一项法案制定数字资产的联邦规则至关重要，该法案需在今年春季提交总统唐纳德·特朗普签署生效。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Friday that it was important for Congress to pass a bill to create federal rules for digital assets and get it onto President Donald Trump's desk to sign into law this spring.】

item.title: 世界杯与软饮为大型啤酒商带来曙光，此前2025年曾遭遇"惨淡"局面
item.description: 大型啤酒商及其股东正寄望于2026年带来转机，押注足球世界杯赛事和转向软饮料业务能帮助他们克服地缘政治动荡、注重健康的Z世代年轻人以及生活成本危机带来的挑战。【原文：Big brewers and their shareholders are hoping for some 2026 cheer, betting soccer's World Cup and a pivot to soft drinks can help overcome challenges from geopolitical turbulence, health-conscious Gen Z youth and cost of living crises.】

item.title: 大众汽车表示，在特朗普废除气候政策后，其转型承诺不变。
item.description: 大众汽车周五表示，尽管注意到美国总统特朗普近期对气候法规的调整，但该公司仍长期致力于推进更高效、低排放的汽车发展路线。【原文：Volkswagen remains committed to its course towards more efficient and low-emission vehicles in the long term, the German carmaker said on Friday, taking note of a recent change to U.S. climate regulation under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 贝森特称参议院银行委员会同意推进对美联储提名人沃什的听证会
item.description: 财政部长斯科特·贝森特周五表示，尽管有位关键参议员对提名持保留态度，参议院银行委员会仍将推进对唐纳德·特朗普总统提名的美联储主席人选凯文·沃什的确认听证会。【原文：The Senate Banking Committee will proceed with confirmation hearings for Kevin Warsh, President Donald Trump's pick to head the Federal Reserve, despite a key senator's hold on the nomination, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Friday.】

item.title: 莫德纳季度营收超预期，得益于新冠疫苗销售韧性
item.description: 莫德纳公司周五公布的第四季度营收超出华尔街预期，这得益于其新冠疫苗在美国市场的销售表现优于预期。【原文：Moderna reported fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Friday, banking on better-than-expected sales of its COVID-19 vaccine in the U.S.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：暗夜之舞
item.description: 迈克·多兰和ROI团队本周末最期待阅读、观看和收听的内容。【原文：Everything Mike Dolan and the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称欧佩克+倾向于4月起恢复增产
item.description: 据三位OPEC+消息人士透露，该组织正倾向于从4月起恢复增产计划，以应对夏季用油高峰。当前油价因美伊关系紧张而获得支撑。【原文：OPEC+ is leaning towards a resumption in oil output increases from April, three OPEC+ sources said, as the group prepares for peak summer demand and price strength is bolstered by tensions over U.S.-Iran relations.】

item.title: 美国股指期货走势平淡，通胀数据即将公布
item.description: 美国股指期货周五持平，此前人工智能引发抛售潮。投资者在通胀数据公布前保持观望，该数据或将为美联储降息前景提供更多指引。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were trading flat on Friday after an AI-led selloff, with investors staying on the sidelines ahead of inflation data that could provide more clarity on the Federal Reserve's rate-cut outlook.】

item.title: 阿波罗与黑石高管力图安抚市场，因软件行业抛售潮也冲击其股价
item.description: 阿波罗、阿瑞斯、黑石、KKR等私募资本公司的高管正面临困境，他们难以说服股市投资者相信，其投资组合能免受软件行业抛售潮的冲击——这场抛售源于市场担忧人工智能将使该行业失去存在价值。【原文：Executives at Apollo , Ares , Blackstone , KKR and other private capital firms are having trouble convincing stock market investors that their portfolios are safe from the effects of a selloff battering the software sector due to fears that artificial intelligence will render it irrelevant.】

item.title: 华尔街本周展望：沃尔玛财报与经济数据待揭晓，投资者面临AI"打地鼠"式挑战
item.description: 美国股市投资者下周将保持警惕，防范因对人工智能颠覆性影响的担忧引发的进一步波动。与此同时，他们还将评估市场表面之下轮动行情的可持续性，并关注沃尔玛即将公布的财报及最新经济数据。【原文：U.S. stock investors will be on guard next week for further volatility induced by fears of artificial intelligence disruption as they also assess the durability of a rotation beneath the market's surface, along with upcoming earnings from Walmart and fresh economic data.】

item.title: 美国可能对希姆斯公司采取包括罚款在内的措施，此前该公司曾短暂推出仿制药Wegovy。
item.description: 特朗普政府可能对在线远程医疗公司Hims采取行动，包括发布禁令或处以罚款，因该公司意图销售诺和诺德公司减肥药Wegovy的复合版本。不过律师和其他专家告诉路透社，Hims的迅速退让可能限制政府的法律选项。【原文：The Trump administration could take action including an injunction or fines against online telehealth company Hims for intending to sell a compounded version of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill, though its legal options may be curbed by Hims' quick retreat, attorneys and other experts told Reuters.】

item.title: 马斯克点燃SpaceX，贝索斯推动蓝色起源，美国亿万富豪竞相与中国的登月竞赛
item.description: 美国亿万富豪间的太空竞赛正日趋白热化。埃隆·马斯克的SpaceX公司计划建造月球基地，而杰夫·贝索斯则全力推进蓝色起源的雄心壮志——两家公司都力图在中国2030年计划登月任务之前实现人类重返月球。【原文：The space race between U.S. billionaires is heating up, with Elon Musk's SpaceX planning to build a lunar base and Jeff Bezos pushing Blue Origin's ambitions as both companies aim to return humans to the moon ahead of a planned mission by China in 2030.】

item.title: 欧盟有条件批准环球音乐收购Downtown唱片公司
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，已附条件批准环球音乐集团收购Downtown Music。【原文：The European Commission said on Friday it had approved with conditions Universal Music Group's acquisition of Downtown Music.】

item.title: 美国股票基金因降息不确定性与人工智能担忧遭遇资金外流
item.description: 截至2月11日当周，美国股票基金出现资金流出，因投资者担忧人工智能相关企业支出，且强劲的就业报告削弱了市场对美联储降息的预期。【原文：U.S. equity funds recorded outflows in the week to February 11 on worries over AI-related corporate spending and as a stronger jobs report dampened expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 欧卫通信首席执行官称，欧盟对抗星链的项目必须满足买家期望
item.description: 欧洲卫星通信公司周五表示，欧洲计划中的IRIS2卫星网络必须在定价和性能方面满足客户期望，才能吸引买家。此前多家大型电信公司对该项目的商业吸引力发表了看法。【原文：Eutelsat said on Friday that Europe's planned IRIS2 satellite network must meet customer expectations in terms of pricing and performance to attract buyers, following remarks from major telecoms companies about the project's commercial appeal.】

item.title: 在香港上市的登喜路计划在美国进行双重上市
item.description: 行李箱制造商新秀丽周五表示，正寻求在美国证券交易所实现双重上市，以期在更多市场提升其在投资者中的曝光度。【原文：Luggage maker Samsonite said on Friday it is seeking a dual listing on a U.S. stock exchange in a bid to increase its exposure to investors in more markets.】

item.title: 中国1月新增贷款激增但低于预期，需求疲软持续
item.description: 中国1月份新增银行贷款较上月大幅增长，但低于市场预期，且远低于一年前的历史峰值。信贷需求疲软持续拖累着这个全球第二大经济体的借贷活动。【原文：China’s new bank lending jumped in January from the previous month but was below expectations and far short of the record level a year earlier, as subdued credit demand continued to weigh on borrowing in the world's second-largest economy.】

item.title: SpaceX发射第12支长期驻留乘组前往国际空间站
item.description: 周五凌晨，一枚SpaceX火箭从佛罗里达州升空，搭载两名美国宇航局宇航员、一名法国宇航员和一名俄罗斯航天员前往国际空间站，将在地球轨道上执行为期八个月的科学任务。【原文：A SpaceX rocket lifted off from Florida early on Friday with a crew of two U.S. NASA astronauts, a French astronaut and a Russian cosmonaut headed to the International Space Station for an eight-month science mission in Earth orbit.】

item.title: 数据显示，欧盟贸易持续遭受美国关税和中国竞争的冲击
item.description: 欧盟贸易顺差持续收窄，周五公布的数据显示，关税拖累对美出口，而中国进口增长挤压了国内生产，凸显出欧盟经济模式面临的生存威胁。【原文：The EU's trade surplus kept shrinking, data showed on Friday, as tariffs weighed on exports to the U.S. and rising Chinese imports crowded out domestic production, highlighting existential threats to the bloc's economic model.】

item.title: 应用材料股价飙升，人工智能需求推动芯片制造设备订单激增
item.description: 应用材料公司股价周五盘前交易中飙升11.7%，因该公司预测第二季度营收和利润将超出华尔街预期，投资者押注人工智能需求激增和内存市场趋紧将持续推动其芯片制造设备的订单量。【原文：Applied Materials' shares jumped 11.7% in premarket trading on Friday as investors bet that surging AI demand and a tightening memory market will continue to drive orders for the company's chipmaking tools, after it forecast second-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates.】

item.title: 挪威航空首席执行官表示，该公司无意使用星链Wi-Fi服务
item.description: 挪威航空首席执行官盖尔·卡尔森周五向路透社表示，该公司目前暂不计划在飞机上安装星链的Wi-Fi服务，因为这家廉价航空公司已在航班上提供另一供应商的付费服务。【原文：Norwegian Air Shuttle does not plan to bring Starlink's Wi-Fi onto its aircraft for now, as the budget airline offers a paid service from another vendor on its flights, CEO Geir Karlsen told Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 独家：字节跳动正就以60亿美元以上价格出售游戏子公司Moonton进行谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，字节跳动正就出售旗下上海摩天科技公司进行深入谈判，该公司开发了热门手游《王者荣耀》。交易对象为沙特阿拉伯的Savvy Games集团，交易估值在60亿至70亿美元之间。【原文：ByteDance is in advanced talks to sell Shanghai Moonton Technology, the studio behind the popular mobile game Mobile Legends: Bang Bang, to Saudi Arabia's Savvy Games Group in a deal valued at between $6 billion and $7 billion, sources said.】

item.title: 中国生物技术许可申请量激增，2026年将创历史新高，研发项目储备持续扩大
item.description: 全球制药商正加紧寻求中国研发的实验性药物，以在专利到期前削减成本。行业分析师预测，今年许可协议数量将激增至历史新高。【原文：Global drugmakers are stepping up their search for China‑developed experimental medicines as they cut costs ahead of patent expirations, with industry analysts predicting licensing deals will surge to a fresh record this year.】

item.title: 凯捷首席执行官驳斥欧洲实现完全技术自主的呼声
item.description: 凯捷首席执行官艾曼·埃扎特周五驳斥了欧洲实现全面技术主权的呼声。当前，随着跨大西洋关系日趋紧张，欧洲对美国科技巨头的依赖引发了广泛担忧。【原文：Capgemini CEO Aiman Ezzat on Friday dismissed calls for a total technological sovereignty in Europe, at a time when fraying transatlantic relations have stoked concerns about the region's dependence on U.S. tech majors.】

item.title: 赛峰集团对介入普惠公司与空客的发动机纠纷持谨慎态度
item.description: 赛峰集团首席执行官奥利维尔·安德烈斯周五表示，喷气发动机制造商CFM将尽最大努力满足空客今年提出的超出协议数量的额外发动机需求，但其首要任务是履行现有供货承诺。【原文：Jet engine maker CFM will do its best to meet any request for additional engines from Airbus this year, over and above agreed quantities, but its priority is to meet its existing supply commitments, Safran CEO Olivier Andries said on Friday.】

item.title: 欧洲、亚洲引领股票基金资金流入，美国则出现周度资金外流
item.description: 截至2月11日当周，欧洲和亚洲股票基金资金大幅涌入，因投资者削减了对美国巨型股的配置，担忧其估值过高且人工智能相关支出持续攀升。【原文：European and Asian equity funds drew strong inflows in the week ended February 11 as investors trimmed exposure to U.S. mega-cap stocks on concerns about stretched valuations and rising AI-related spending.】
